_description: A prophecy of the End of the World, attributed to Daniel — two long couplets

StPauls9Dxix.Transcription:
Whanne þo hilles smoken þanne babilon schal haue an
                        eendebut whan þey brenne as þo fyyr þanne
                    eerthe schal henes weendeWhenne þo watres rennen hem froo þo
                        folk pepul schal turne into eerthe a ȝeyne& yf
                    þe bleeden al a boute ouer all men schul be slayne
StPauls9Dxix.Note: Written as prose, top four lines.
